message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.SC 

This paper deals with termination analysis of logic programs, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of logic (cs.LO), programming languages (cs.PL), software engineering (cs.SE), formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL), and symbolic computation (cs.SC). The paper specifically focuses on transformational approaches that transform logic programs into term rewrite systems, which is a technique commonly used in symbolic computation and formal languages and automata theory. Therefore, these sub-categories are the most likely ones for this paper.
